title: SFTP
description: A connector that allows for fetching data via SFTP

host.title: Host/IP
host.description: The hostname or IP address of the SFTP server. Example: `sftp.example.com` or `192.168.1.10`.

port.title: Port
port.description: The port number to connect to the SFTP server. Example: `22` (default SSH port).

username.title: Username
username.description: The username used to authenticate with the SFTP server

password.title: Password
password.description: The password used to authenticate with the SFTP server

user_dir.title: User directory
user_dir.description: The directory that the user has access to
